Title : 
 Report of the Joint EIFAAC / ICES / GFCM Working Group on Eels ( WGEEL ) 

 Abstract : 
 The Joint EIFAAC / ICES / GFCM Working group on eels ( WGEEL ) met in a split meeting from 4–8 September ( online ) and 25 September–02 October 2023 ( hybrid meeting ) in Helsinki , Finland , to provide the scientific basis for the ICES advice on fishing opportunities and conservation aspects for the European eel and address requests from EIFAAC and GFCM .
